newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Shaw Group started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Shaw Group started as buy.

text.p: --Rauscher Pierce Refsnes Inc said Tuesday it initiated coverage of Shaw Group Inc, a Louisiana-based fabricator of pipe, with a buy-market outperformer rating.
--Its 12-month price target on the stock is $30-$31.
